title: AstroTours Postponed Till Further Notice
speaker: Get Vaccinated!
abstract: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic and the recommendations from the University of Toronto to cancel all discretionary events, we will be postponing AstroTours indefinitely. We hope to schedule AstroTours for another time, when it is safe to do so. We are monitoring the situation and will update our website and social media with that decision when it is finalized. We will continue to host our monthly events after the situation has been managed and the safety of our attendees and volunteers is not jeapordized. In the meantime please wash your hands with soap (for 15 seconds or more) or use hand sanitizer, avoid touching your face, disinfect frequently used surfaces, cough or sneeze into a tissue, self-isolate if you are feeling unwell, and get vaccinated as soon as you can. For more information about symptoms and Toronto Public Health services and links to book a vaccine appointment in Ontario, click below.
